english: She is white and he is colored .
chinese: 她是白种人而他是有色人种。

english: Most of them had never set eyes on white people before .
chinese: 他们大多数人以前都没有见过白种人。

english: Thus, it would be a great offence for a white man to scalp the dead .
chinese: 所以象割死人头皮这样的事，白种人认为是莫大的罪过。

english: I think it's the non-asian or the caucasian that has to have the affinity for the mate's culture .
chinese: 我认为非亚裔或白种人的一方应当喜爱配偶的文化。

english: Like many hard-pressed city school systems, new york's was not equipped to handle students who did not fit the white .
chinese: 纽约市的中学和许多财政拮据、师资匮乏的城市中学一样，没有条件来培养非白种人。
白种人造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: As they went paddling down the lake a hot discussion was maintained concerning the respective merits of the palefaces and the redskins .
chinese: 在顺湖而下的途中，他们展开了一场有关白种人和红种人优劣得失的激烈舌战。

english: These policies will affect non - whites especially
chinese: 这些政策对非白种人的影响特别大

english: Can you remember any white people we ' ve ever bombed
chinese: 记得曾经被我们炸过的白种人吗

english: White missionary too salty . like pickled pork
chinese: 白种人传教师味道太咸了，很像腌猪肉。

english: The white people here don ' t mix socially with the natives
chinese: 这里的白种人不与土人交往

english: Dear white , something you got to know
chinese: 亲爱的白种人，有几件事你必须知道。

english: Ready to bust a cap in any white boy ' s ass
chinese: 准备要把子弹打进随便一个白种人屁股的有色人种

english: Ready to bust a cap in any white boy ' s ass
chinese: 准备要把子弹打进随便一个白种人屁股的有色人种

english: When this guy woke up this morning , he was white
chinese: 这个家伙今天早上起来的时候,还是白种人

english: Dear white people , there ' s something you need to know
chinese: 亲爱的白种人，有几件事你必须知道。
